sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link, animateScroll as scroll } from "react-scroll"; import "./about.styles.css"; import ProfilePic from './profile-pic.jpg' import FastIcon from "./fast-icon.png"; import ResponsiveIcon from "./responsive-icon.png"; import EngagingIcon from "./engaging-icon.svg"; import ScalableIcon from "./scalable-icon.svg"; import ScrollDownButton from "../scroll-down-button/scroll-down-button.component" const About = ({offsetVal}) => (

About Me

Self-taught. NYC-based.

Dev with a passion for clean, engaging and accesible design.

Engaging

Design that turns your website into not just a destination, but an experience

Responsive

Websites and web-apps that work on any screen, big or small

Fast

From front to back, and everything in between, content loads ASAP

Scalable

Built to grow from the ground up. Infintely scalale and effortlessly readable
); export default About;
